scripts.release-phonegap-wp8: npm run build:setup && phonegap --verbose build wp8 && npm run build:config-wp8
scripts.build:setup: npm run build:clean && npm run build:setup:directories
scripts.release-android: npm run build:setup && phonegap build android --verbose --release --buildConfig=./resources/signing/android/build-config.json
scripts.release-ios: npm run build:setup && phonegap build ios --verbose --device --release --buildConfig=./resources/signing/ios/build-config.json
scripts.release-wp8: npm run build:setup && phonegap --verbose build wp8 && npm run build:config-wp8 && phonegap compile wp8 --release --verbose
scripts.adhoc-android: npm run build:setup:adhoc && phonegap plugin add cordova-plugin-hockeyapp && phonegap build android --verbose --debug --buildConfig=./resources/signing/android/ad-hoc/build-config.json && npm run build:config:restore
scripts.adhoc-ios: npm run build:setup:adhoc && phonegap plugin add cordova-plugin-hockeyapp && phonegap build ios --verbose --device --debug --buildConfig=./resources/signing/ios/build-config.json && npm run build:config:restore
scripts.adhoc-wp8: npm run build:setup:adhoc && phonegap --verbose build wp8 && phonegap compile wp8 --release --verbose && npm run build:config:restore
scripts.test-wp8: npm run build:setup && phonegap --verbose build wp8 --test
